# Villa SDK

> Privacy-first passkey authentication for Base network. No wallets. No passwords. Just Face ID.

## Quick Integration (3 lines)

```bash
npm install @rockfridrich/villa-sdk viem zod
```

```typescript
import { villa } from '@rockfridrich/villa-sdk'

const user = await villa.signIn()
console.log(user.address, user.nickname)
```

## React Integration

```tsx
import { useVilla, VillaButton } from '@rockfridrich/villa-sdk-react'

function App() {
  const { user } = useVilla()
  return user ? <p>@{user.nickname}</p> : <VillaButton />
}
```

## API

### Simple (Recommended)
```ts
import { villa } from '@rockfridrich/villa-sdk'

await villa.signIn()    // Sign in
villa.user              // Current user
villa.signOut()         // Sign out
```

### Advanced (Custom Config)
```ts
import { Villa } from '@rockfridrich/villa-sdk'
const client = new Villa({ appId: 'my-app', network: 'base' })
```

## Types
```typescript
type VillaAuthResult =
  | { success: true; identity: { address: string; nickname: string; avatar: AvatarConfig } }
  | { success: false; error: string }
```
